scripts.devfullstart: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devproxyserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm start"
scripts.integfullstart: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devproxyserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=integ npm start"
scripts.acptfullstart: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devproxyserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=acpt npm start"
scripts.prodfullstart: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devproxyserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm start"
scripts.deployfullstart: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run devproxyserver" "cross-env NODE_ENV=deploy npm start"
